website_summaries.verdict: This affordable denim tote diaper bag works well for both moms and dads and comes with some handy extras.
pros: Unisex navy-blue bag features tan-colored handles and shoulder straps
Offers nine pockets, including two side pockets designed to hold bottles
Includes diaper changing pad and detachable stroller straps
cons: Denim is a bit stiff and not as soft as you might expect – but it's durable

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag for moms with multiple kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag. I have three kids and live where it is hotter than the surface of the sun , in Southwest Florida. I need pockets for stainless steel water bottles for myself and the two older children. This has 4 large drink bottle pockets, accessible from the outside of the bag. Every mom with multiple kids needs this bag. Awesome!! Plenty of room and pockets inside. High quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bag a few months and really like it. I have also washed it and dried it on low-medium (took awhile though) and it did great. There is plenty of room for everything. I also really like that it’s not made out of some chemicals like PU and such and dad can carry it too without shame :)
customer_reviews.author: Springleaves

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for low price
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really great quality especially for the price. I have 2 expensive designer diaper bags but I wanted something cheap to haul through the airport. Didn’t want to throw my expensive bags all over the place. So I bought this. It turned out to be better than expected. The storage and pockets every where are great, especially for traveling. When I got to my destination I didn’t even bother switching to my other bag I carry this one often. It’s super cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Dee M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait, get this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Nice and big. I got it because I’m always carrying a lot of stuff around for my 19 month old. Has lots of pockets to hold sippy cups, diapers, wipes etc. I love the large pockets on the outside for convenience! Great product especially for the price. I recommend to anyone with a child.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately discontinued!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I have always carried a big purse and that is what I’m using it as. I love all the pockets in it. I this on August 5,2020 and I decided I wanted another one for work. So I went to order another today and to my disappointment it has been discontinued. I am so upset. I checked other bags out and I haven’t found any I like as much. There was a maybe but I don’t want to pay almost double what this one cost. So if it ever comes back in stock I hope to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great  great!
customer_reviews.text: needed something with big storage for 1-2 days travel by plane. this bag fits my baby and my stuff easily for 2 days trip. you get your things lost in it, so make sure you get most important things handy, on the outside pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color, the material, only thing was that it was missing the stroller straps. Other than that it’s big and roomy for a perfect price. Also, unisex. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it stylish, but it is so easy to keep everything organized with all the pockets and storage space. My favorite feature Is the zipper the closes the whole main compartment, because it keeps my 15 month old out of there (my last diaper bag didn’t have that and it was chaos). Love this diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Megan G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The bag was nicely made and I liked the colour...i gave it 4 stars because it was just way too large for my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bag in the same style with this company. It is perfectly sized, has a ton of room inside the bag and outside in pockets, and is super durable. My 1st one lasted 2 years of daily use and a lot of abuse. I machine wash and hang to dry. Best diaper bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: shananiginz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Unisex Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and being able to fit everything I need in the bag. The inside is dark and things can get lost and I often end up emptying the bag to find things.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Catanzarite

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! It's very spacious and has plenty of pockets for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl23

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it!!! So much space. Good looking for both genders. Love it love it love it!
customer_reviews.author: amelia Gutiérrez

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag! Great quality & lots of room! We started out with backpack diaper bag, but after a few months I wanted something I could multi use as a purse and this works perfect for that!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Love this Hip Cub Denim Diaper Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Not only is it great looking, but very versatile too. It can be used as both a diaper bag and a regular bag with pockets and compartments inside and out. Bag is hardy and beautifully made, is the perfect size, and has a long, adjustable strap as well as shoulder straps. Highly recommend for personal use and makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Janine D Rostovsky

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room.
customer_reviews.text: I have two young children and this holds all that and then some. I am able to shove everything I need into it and still have room.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekkah

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Finally have a bag that will fit everything my baby and I need and still zipper!
customer_reviews.author: kristen garofalo

customer_reviews.title: Well satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received it as a gift and loves it
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a knitting/crochet bags. Works well for me. Plenty of pockets and inside storage.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gilchrest

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this diaperbag
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this diaperbag, I love all the pockets that help keep me organized. It looks great and seems like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: kat pretty

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the fabric is excellent. I am extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Davika Alafas

product_meta.title: Diaper Bag Tote Large Unisex Stylish Travel Baby Bag by Hip Cub for Mom and Dad with Changing Pad and Stroller Straps, Denim
feature_bullets: DESIGNER DENIM! Our new Hip Cub Denim Collection redefines ‘functional fashion.’ The dark navy denim fabric is exquisitely complimented by the tan accent in the trimming, handles and adjustable shoulder straps. It’s hard to believe at first sight this cool, cute and super fashionable handbag happens to actually be a practical diaper bag!

DURABLE DENIM! We understand just how much wear and tear baby bags go through. So when designing our brand new collection we decided that a top quality (but not cheap) denim was the logical choice because not only is it totally on trend, stylish, versatile and comfortable... it is a super-durable and tough fabric that can handle the messy business that is kids!

DYNAMIC DENIM! This bag is the Goldilocks of diaper bag totes as it is not too large and not too small. It is the ‘just right’ medium-large size to be roomy and spacious with a comfortable amount of storage. It has a total of 9 pockets including; 2 x large exterior front pockets, 2 x deep exterior elasticated side bottle holder pockets, 1 x exterior zipper pocket on the back, 1 x secure interior zipper main compartment, 1 x large interior sleeve pocket and 2 x deep interior elasticated pockets

DETACHABLE DENIM! This unisex maternity bag includes universal stroller straps that allow you to easily attach your baby bag just like a stroller organizer, so that you can simply access all of your baby boy or baby girl essentials on the move. It also comes with a cute matching navy portable infant changing mat as well as an adjustable crossbody shoulder strap.

100% DEPENDABLE DENIM! We think you are going to be head-over-heels in love with our new Denim Diaper bag collection, but just in case you are not for any reason whatsoever, we provide a 90-day 100% money back warranty. Surely one of the best baby shower gifts on any expecting mother could wish for!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars74 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
